text: Posemu bud' terpeliv k tomu, chto oni govoryat, i proslavlyay khvaloy svoyego Gospoda pered voskhodom solntsa i pered yego zakatom (sovershay rassvetnyy i poslepoludennyy namazy), slav' yego v techeniye nochi (sovershay vecherniy i nochnyye namazy), a takzhe v nachale i kontse dnya (sovershay poludennyy i zakatnyy namazy). Byt' mozhet, ty ostanesh'sya dovolen
